languages.text: "Кей-морагх! Священное оружие Детей Азуриана должно покоиться с павшими, а не служить стервятникам мон-кай!"

traits.locale_text: "Каэ-морагх! Священное оружие Детей Азуриана должно покоиться с павшими, а не служить стервятникам мон-кай!"

languages.text: "Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"
languages.original_text: "Кей-морагх! Священное оружие Детей Азуриана должно покоиться с павшими, а не служить стервятникам мон-кай!"

traits.locale_text: "Kae-moragh! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"
"Kae-moragh! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve the mon-keigh scavengers!"
"Kae-moragh! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"
"Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"
"Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"

languages.text: 「カエ＝モラグ！ アシュリアンの御子の神聖な武器は倒れた者たちとともにあるべきだ。こんなモン＝ケイの略奪者の手に渡るべきではない！」
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"

traits.locale_text: 「くそ！ アシュリアンの御子の神聖な武器は倒れた者たちとともにあるべきだ。こんなモン＝ケイの略奪者の手に渡るべきではない！」

languages.text: «¡Kae-morag! Los armamentos sagrados de los hijos de Asuryan deberían descansar con los caídos, ¡no servir a estos carroñeros mon-keigh!».
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Kae-moragh! Los armamentos sagrados de los hijos de Asuryan deberían descansar con los caídos, ¡no servir a estos carroñeros mon-keigh!».

languages.text: “该死！阿苏焉子嗣神圣的武器应该陪伴在它们殒命的主人身边，不该落入这些猴子拾荒者的手里！”
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"

traits.locale_text: “该死！阿苏焉子嗣神圣的武器应该陪伴在它们殒命的主人身边，不该落入这些猴子拾荒者的手里！”

languages.text: « Kae-morag ! Les armes sacrées des enfants d'Asuryan doivent reposer aux côtés des morts, et non pas finir aux mains de pilleurs mon-keigh ! »
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"

traits.locale_text: « Kae-morag ! Les armes sacrées des enfants d'Asuryan doivent reposer aux côtés des morts, et non pas finir aux mains de pilleurs mon-keigh ! »

languages.text: "Kae-morag! Die heiligen Waffen der Kinder von Asuryan müssen bei den Gefallenen ruhen, sie dürfen nicht den Chem-Pan-Sey-Plünderern dienen!"
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"

traits.locale_text: "Kae-moragh! Die heiligen Waffen der Kinder von Asuryan müssen bei den Gefallenen ruhen, sie dürfen nichn den Chem-Pan-Sey-Plünderern dienen!"

languages.text: "Kae-morag! Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın kutsal silahları; bu mon-keigh hurdacılarının elinde değil, ölenlerin yanında olmalı!"
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag! The sacred armaments of the Children of Asuryan must rest with the fallen, not serve these mon-keigh scavengers!"
